title: Partnership with Rorix Holdings for Global Trade Finance and Fintech Expansion
description: IHC and its subsidiary Sirius International Holding launched Rorix Holdings—a finance and trade facilitation company targeting trade finance, advisory, commodities, and insurance. This creates a platform for collaboration with fintech, logistics, and commodity trading firms seeking to access new markets and financial products.
example: A fintech company from Europe looking to offer trade finance solutions in the UAE and the wider MENA region could partner with Rorix Holdings to leverage its established infrastructure, access to local compliance, and client base. Logistics companies aiming to digitize cross-border transaction flows could work with Rorix to develop tailored trade finance solutions.
roadmap: Step 1: Identify target markets and complementary service gaps within Rorix Holdings offering.
Step 2: Establish communication between the interested company and Rorix Holdings business development team.
Step 3: Develop joint product/service proposals integrating both parties' technologies.
Step 4: Pilot combined service offering with selected clients in the MENA region.
Step 5: Scale up partnership with co-marketing and potential equity or revenue sharing.
source_name: IHC Announces Strong Nine-Month YTD 2024 Results with 49.4% Revenue Growth to AED 64.0 Billion and AED 18.0 Billion Profit After Tax

title: Collaborate with Enersol in Oil & Gas Innovation
description: Enersol, part of IHC, acquired EV Holdings to advance downhole visualization technology for oil and gas diagnostics. This move opens up avenues for technology providers, engineering firms, and oilfield service companies to jointly develop or deploy novel subsurface diagnostic solutions.
example: An engineering firm with AI-powered image analysis software could partner with Enersol to integrate its algorithms into downhole visualization platforms and offer enhanced analytics to major oil & gas companies in the MENA and global markets.
roadmap: Step 1: Present technology pitch to Enersol's innovation unit.
Step 2: Jointly scope integration or co-development project for visualization or diagnostic products.
Step 3: Pilot integrated solutions on Enersol's client sites.
Step 4: Negotiate commercial terms for broad rollout.
Step 5: Expand offering to third-party customers in regional or global markets.
source_name: IHC Announces Strong Nine-Month YTD 2024 Results with 49.4% Revenue Growth to AED 64.0 Billion and AED 18.0 Billion Profit After Tax

title: Co-Investment and Project Partnership Opportunities with NMDC Energy
description: With NMDC Energy—the UAE's largest EPC contractor—recently launching a highly oversubscribed IPO, there is significant interest and available cash for co-investments and joint energy, marine or dredging infrastructure projects in the Gulf region and beyond.
example: Global construction or infrastructure firms could partner with NMDC Energy on mega projects, especially those requiring marine construction expertise or joint bidding for large EPC contracts in the Middle East or Africa.
roadmap: Step 1: Reach out to NMDC Energy's business development or investor relations teams.
Step 2: Exchange capabilities and appetite for JV or consortium project bidding.
Step 3: Identify upcoming mega-project tenders in the region.
Step 4: Develop consortium bid structure and submit proposals.
Step 5: Execute and manage joint projects, sharing technology and expertise.
source_name: IHC Announces Strong Nine-Month YTD 2024 Results with 49.4% Revenue Growth to AED 64.0 Billion and AED 18.0 Billion Profit After Tax

title: M&A and Joint Ventures with IHC’s Real Estate and Construction Segment
description: The segment's robust growth, including consolidations of Modon, ADNEC, Miza, and Aldar, signals openness to further real estate and construction deals. Companies can seek joint ventures, project development agreements, or propose targeted M&A in the UAE or across the GCC.
example: A regional real estate developer could enter a JV with IHC or Aldar for a new mixed-use project in Abu Dhabi or Saudi Arabia, leveraging IHC’s resources, local knowledge, and acquisition appetite.
roadmap: Step 1: Approach IHC’s real estate M&A or business development team.
Step 2: Propose JV or acquisition opportunities with clear value-add.
Step 3: Conduct due diligence and structure investment/partnership terms.
Step 4: Secure regulatory and internal approvals.
Step 5: Launch project, leveraging joint marketing, funding, and operational synergies.
source_name: IHC Announces Strong Nine-Month YTD 2024 Results with 49.4% Revenue Growth to AED 64.0 Billion and AED 18.0 Billion Profit After Tax

title: Partnering with Al Ain Farms for Regional Agribusiness Expansion
description: With Al Ain Farms expanding into Saudi Arabia through the acquisition of Saha Arabian Farms, companies in the food & beverage, logistics, and agriTech sectors can partner to strengthen supply chains, raise operational efficiency, or develop new F&B products for GCC markets.
example: A cold chain logistics provider could enter into a supply agreement with Al Ain Farms to deliver poultry and livestock products across the GCC, leveraging IHC’s expanded footprint. AgriTech startups can pilot precision farming technology with Saha Arabian Farms.
roadmap: Step 1: Initiate contact with Al Ain Farms/Ghitha’s procurement or business partnerships division.
Step 2: Identify synergy areas (logistics, tech, product development).
Step 3: Pilot new service/product across selected farm sites or supply chains.
Step 4: Roll out full-scale partnership/contract following successful pilot.
Step 5: Expand the partnership to cover additional product lines or regions.
source_name: IHC Announces Strong Nine-Month YTD 2024 Results with 49.4% Revenue Growth to AED 64.0 Billion and AED 18.0 Billion Profit After Tax

title: Providing Digital Financing via eFunder Platform Acquisition
description: IHC’s acquisition of eFunder, a digital financing platform for SMEs, creates opportunities for banks, alternative lenders, and fintech firms to white-label, invest in, or integrate their lending/receivables management products into eFunder’s ecosystem and tap into the UAE/GCC SME market.
example: A regional bank could partner with eFunder to digitize its SME lending, offering invoice discounting and working capital loans via the eFunder platform, reducing origination costs and accessing new SME clients.
roadmap: Step 1: Connect with eFunder’s platform integration/business partnership team.
Step 2: Structure co-lending or technology licensing deal.
Step 3: Integrate bank or fintech products within the eFunder SME platform.
Step 4: Launch joint marketing and customer onboarding.
Step 5: Expand digital financing products and cross-sell across the platform.
source_name: IHC Announces Strong Nine-Month YTD 2024 Results with 49.4% Revenue Growth to AED 64.0 Billion and AED 18.0 Billion Profit After Tax

title: Manpower and Accommodation Services Platform Consolidation
description: Sawaeed Holding's acquisition of United International Group (UIG) and Progressive Real Estate Development consolidates manpower and accommodation services via Emirates Stallions Group. Companies in facilities management, HR-tech, or labor sourcing can propose technology implementations, joint ventures, or BPO contracts.
example: A company specializing in HR-tech solutions for workforce management could partner with Emirates Stallions Group to deploy digital platforms that enhance efficiency and compliance across workforce accommodation sites in the UAE.
roadmap: Step 1: Engage with Sawaeed Holding/Emirates Stallions Group to understand operational needs.
Step 2: Demonstrate technological or service fit and pilot solution on selected sites.
Step 3: Structure partnership or BPO contract for wider deployment.
Step 4: Roll out across group sites with performance KPIs.
Step 5: Explore expansion opportunities into other GCC countries with group support.
source_name: IHC Announces Strong Nine-Month YTD 2024 Results with 49.4% Revenue Growth to AED 64.0 Billion and AED 18.0 Billion Profit After Tax
